Nevertheless thank you for your upload.

Excellent torrent. Worked perfectly. The only thing is that it wants me to update to 10.0.5 from the App Store and I can't without logging into macotavio@mac.com. Any work around?
Maybe you could update the application and repost the _MasReceipt. That would really help me a lot.
The updater only works with copies purchased from Apple's App store. I don't think that anyone has a workaround for this.

For those looking for a legit copy of FCPX 10.0.5 I just uploaded one today http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7468323/Final_Cut_Pro_X_10.0.5
